item.title: Community
item.description: Community Topics Staying informed Code contribution Issue reporting Staying informed Follow and join us on Loreshelf Subreddit. Code contribution Loreshelf is an Open Source project licensed under the GNU General Public License v3. The source code is hosted on GitHub. Issue reporting Look up and report found Loreshelf issues on GitHub.

item.title: License

item.title: What's new
item.description: What's new Find out what's new in the latest Loreshelf release. Changelog v1.3 - November 15th, 2020 The highlighted new feature of this release is fulltext fuzzy search. A few minor issues were fixed. If you run on Win/Linux you may upgrade inside your app automatically through the notifications or using the menu. Mac users may install Loreshelf 1.3 here. New feature Fulltext fuzzy search Find notebooks and notecards which contain similar or exact text.
